ValidationRule.description: CNA Middle Market Policies commission rate is 15%
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
$Setup.Master_Validation__c.Account_Active__c && NOT($RecordType.Name = "Health & Benefits") &&
AND( (NOT (Marketer_UW_Name__c="CNA Agency Services") ), Marketer_UW_Name__r.Account.Name = "CNA", Coverages__c="General Liability", Commission_Rate__c <> 0.15, ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Proposal Approved/Closed Won") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Commission: CNA Middle Market Policies commission rate is 15%
